patterns: Where am I getting my groceries from
responses: We deliver your groceries only from the nearest kirana stores in your neighborhood.

patterns: How do I contact Flocco customer care
responses: You may make use of the chatbot on WhatsApp or write to us at info@flocco.co

patterns: Do you charge a commission from the Kirana stores
responses: No, our aim at Flocco is to support and enable Kirana stores with technology and provide convenience to our customers. We are a zero-commission model and charge a monthly, quarterly or yearly nominal platform fee, from the Kiranas

patterns: How do you pay your riders
responses: All our riders get a good, standard and fixed income that enables them with predictability of income and economic stability. They are given compulsory weekly offs without any pay cut and operate standard working hours as per law

patterns: Which cities are Flocco operating in
responses: We are currently live in Bangalore, specifically within Koramangala. However, we are planning on expanding very soon and you’ll be kept posted!

patterns: What if I want to order from Flocco if they have not expanded to my location yet
responses: At the moment, Flocco is only functional within Koramangala to begin the pilot run. If the delivery address falls within the grid in Koramangala, we can fulfill the order as of now. However, we will expand to the rest of Bangalore very soon. So, stay tuned!

patterns: How do I cancel my order
responses:
Orders placed within working hours (7am to 11pm) can be cancelled within 60 seconds of the order being placed. You will be able to cancel from the order confirmation screen.

Orders placed outside working hours (11pm to 7am) can be cancelled any time before 7 am.

patterns: Is Flocco accountable for the quality of the groceries received
responses: Flocco delivers only packed branded items at this moment. The quality of which is maintained by the kirana stores. However, in case the product that you received is expired, damaged or is not consumable, please tell us more about your problem by typing *Other* in this chat window and we shall respond to you accordingly in due time.

patterns: Is there a minimum order value
responses: No, we have no minimum order value.

The deliveries are free for now, until further notice. However, we aim to give predictability to customers irrespective of weather conditions or availability of riders, or any other circumstance by having a fixed cost for deliveries in the future.

patterns: What if the kirana does not hold brands that I prefer to order
responses: Flocco aims on working with various Kiranas put up in and around your location. Which means, in case one Kirana does not stock on your preferred brands, we will hop into another Kirana nearby to fulfill your order.

patterns: What if I placed a wrong order
responses: In this case, you will have the option to cancel your order within the first 60 seconds of placing the order. If not, the order will be accepted by the Kirana store and delivered.
Yes, we do. Although for the welfare of the rider, each rider has an allowance of 12kg only. In case the order quantity is higher, we will fulfill your order through multiple deliveries.
We are currently working on developing the operations of scheduling deliveries. We aim to make it functional soon!

patterns: What do you mean by ‘your location is not serviceable’
responses: You will see this pop up on your screen if you are out of the location grid we are not currently operational in. However, we are definitely launching in your locality very soon.

patterns: Is registration mandatory to place an order

patterns: Once registered, can I edit my personal information
responses: You may edit your personal information, including delivery address by heading to settings page and tapping on the ‘Profile’ tab. Please click on the relevant data fields to edit/update your information.

patterns: How can I deactivate my Flocco account
responses: We are sorry to see you leave the platform, please do let us know what went wrong for you. However, in case you still want to deactivate your account, you may do so by heading to the settings page and tapping on the ‘Profile’ tab.

patterns: What are the various payment options available
responses: You may choose to pay via United Payments Interface (UPI), Net Banking, Credit/Debit Cards.

patterns: Can I set more than one delivery address on the application
responses: Yes, you may choose to add multiple delivery addresses under your user profile. For ease of convenience, each of these delivery addresses can be tagged to a specific name of your choice

patterns: Is my personal data and information safe with Flocco
